title: Rotational System Learning Control Design: Application Through Repetitive Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic control theory, linear system analysis, and MATLAB/SIMULINK proficiency
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment combining smartphone-based simulation tools with offline worksheets, balancing theory and practice through industry application case studies.

learning_goals: Learners can explain fundamental principles of space-based iterative learning control and apply them to system modeling.
Learners can design tracking error minimization algorithms for rotating systems with unknown periodic parameters.
Learners can analyze stability and convergence characteristics of control systems through numerical simulations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
